name: Toilet Zone
description:
Navigate a flying toilet through a various deadly obstacles and help our poultry boi get back home.

Collect keys in the level to open the gates and reach the final and return home.

Full screen to have a bigger view.

W - Boost toilet
A, D - Rotate toilet

(I recommend downloading if you get stuttering  or sound issues)

Made for Mizjam 1

(ps, there are 4 hidden toilets in the level, can you find them all?)
